subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
subproject.description: Develop and Early recovery programme including a cash for work project for herders to bury livestock carcasses and the creation of alternative livelihood opportunities to Dzud affected herders to provide more disaster resilient means of incomes
subproject.title: Support to the 2010 Dzud

title: Support to the 2010 Dzud in Mongolia
